Name: Unknown
Text: What in the sweet candy is this?

Name: Unknown
Text: I didn't think you would wake up! This is wonderful, what is your name?

Name: Unknown
Text: I don't know, who are you?

Name: MrGerald
Text: How impolite of me, I'm Mr.Gerald and you arrive right at the perfect time!

Name: MrGerald
Text: You see, I've been eying this artifact right outside of these ruins for quite some time, but I'm not so young anymore and I can't reach it.

Name: MrGerald
Text: Could you go get it and bring it back to me? It would mean the world. Just go out the door and you should see it right away!
